https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wqJ3J3H0E06383ZGmoqDGtpbnAu.jpg Small-time crook Atris is tired of working for Berlin crime lord El Keitar. Yet in order to build his own syndicate, he needs money. When his friend Frank offers him a lucrative deal, Atris thinks his chance has finally come, not knowing that he is about to set in motion a fateful chain of events. Asphaltgorillas
